title: 542 26 "A Team Is Formed! Save Chopper"Transliteration: "Chīmu Kessei! Choppā o Sukue" (Japanese:チーム結成！チョッパーを救え) Tetsuya Endō &Yutaka Nakashima Isao Murayama April 8, 2012(2012-04-08)[n 2] N/A
transformers_text: 542 26 A Team Is Formed Save Chopper Transliteration Ch mu Kes sei Chop p o Suk ue Japanese Tetsuya End Yutaka Na kashima Isao Mura yama April 8 2012 2012 04 08 n 2 N A To riko and Luffy continue their search for the ingredients to save Chopper on To Ch uk a Island Note This episode concludes a crossover which began in Episode 51 of To riko Due to licensing restrictions Funimation skipped this episode in every official release
